questions.question_text: A ping attack that exploits the broadcast IP address in a subnet is referred to as what type of attack?

discussion.content: how can it be A? How analysis decrypt and inspect the encryption traffic?

questions.answer_description: The correct answers are "perform decryption and inspection of SSL/TLS traffic" and "perform analysis of the Netflow data to detect anomalous TLS/SSL flows."
questions.question_text: Which two methods might be used by an analyst to detect SSL/TLS encrypted command-and-control communication? (Choose two.)

choices.A: perform decryption and inspection of SSL/TLS traffic
choices.D: perform analysis of the NetFlow data to detect anomalous TLS/SSL flows
choices.B: perform firewall HTTP application inspection to detect for the command and control traffic
choices.C: perform IPS HTTP deep packets inspection to detect for the command and control traffic

questions.question_text: One of the objectives of information security if to protect the CIA of information and systems. What does CIA mean in this context?

discussion.content:
For more information about answer D:

questions.question_text: Which type of encryption algorithm uses the same key to encrypt and decrypt data?

discussion.content: I think the answer should be C...

questions.question_text: To provide origin authentication, the sender encrypts the message using an asymmetric encryption algorithm. In this case, the receiver of the message must use what to decrypt the message?
